title: How to Draw Rat from Pearls Before Swine

steps.headline: Draw two, slightly unfinished circles beside each other with a light pencil.
Draw a small curve and then a spire facing left at the end of the curve.
Draw another curve, this time coming out of Rat's left ear.
Draw two slightly diagonal lines going vertically.
steps.description: One going down at the start of Rat's nose, and another going down at Rat’s cheek. Link the two lines together with a curve at the bottom.

steps.headline: Draw two lines coming out of the curve.
steps.description: And then draw three lines at the end of each line. These are Rat's legs and feet. [[Image:Draw Rat from Pr>

steps.headline: Draw a circle at the tip of Rat's snout.
Draw a curved line with four lines at the end of the line.
steps.description: This is Rat's arm and hands.

steps.headline: Put in two dots at Rat's face as eyes.
Draw over the pencil lines with a good quality, black marker.
steps.description: Also color in the nose with the black marker.

steps.headline: Erase the pencil lines with your eraser for a much neater look.
Color in Rat with a gray coloring pencil if desired.

text: Draw two, slightly unfinished circles beside each other with a light pencil. These will be Rat's ears. Draw a small curve and then a spire facing left at the end of the curve.  Draw another curve, this time coming out of Rat's left ear. This will be his cheek. Draw two slightly diagonal lines going vertically. One going down at the start of Rat's nose, and another going down at Rat’s cheek. Link the two lines together with a curve at the bottom. Draw two lines coming out of the curve. And then draw three lines at the end of each line. These are Rat's legs and feet. [[Image:Draw Rat from Pr> Draw a circle at the tip of Rat's snout.  Draw a curved line with four lines at the end of the line. This is Rat's arm and hands. Put in two dots at Rat's face as eyes.  Draw over the pencil lines with a good quality, black marker. Also color in the nose with the black marker. Erase the pencil lines with your eraser for a much neater look.  Color in Rat with a gray coloring pencil if desired.
sentences: Draw two, slightly unfinished circles beside each other with a light pencil.
Draw a small curve and then a spire facing left at the end of the curve.
Draw another curve, this time coming out of Rat's left ear.
Draw two slightly diagonal lines going vertically.
One going down at the start of Rat's nose, and another going down at Rat’s cheek.
Link the two lines together with a curve at the bottom.
Draw two lines coming out of the curve.
And then draw three lines at the end of each line.
These are Rat's legs and feet.
[[Image:Draw Rat from Pr> Draw a circle at the tip of Rat's snout.
Draw a curved line with four lines at the end of the line.
This is Rat's arm and hands.
Put in two dots at Rat's face as eyes.
Draw over the pencil lines with a good quality, black marker.
Also color in the nose with the black marker.
Erase the pencil lines with your eraser for a much neater look.
Color in Rat with a gray coloring pencil if desired.
